text: Richard E. Grant (born Richard Grant Esterhuysen,The World According To Grant, The Evening Standard Magazine - Friday 17th January, 2003 5 May 1957) is a British actor, screenwriter, and director.Busy Making Other Plans: Richard E. Grant, stopsmilingonline.com, 21 June 2006. He is known for playing Withnail in Withnail and I and as John Seward in the 1992 blockbuster Bram Stoker's Dracula. He also starred in Penelope, Corpse Bride, Logan and in the sixth season of Game of Thrones. In 2018, Grant received critical acclaim for his role as Jack Hock in the drama-biographical movie Can You Ever Forgive Me?. He starred as General Pryde in Star Wars: Episode IX (2019). ==References== ==Other websites== * â€“ official site * *"Memories of Mischief". The Guardian, 6 August 2005. title: Richard E. Grant
